Name: Wall Partition, Type: Gypsum with wood studs, Full Height, Fixed Below, Fixed Above

GeneralInformation.Description: Quantity is based upon 13'x100' Panels.  Quantity of wall damaged varies by damage state.
GeneralInformation.Author: Not Given

DamageStates.Description: Cracking of paint over fasteners or joints
DamageStates.RepairMeasures: Gypsum wallboard repaired by replacing the tape along the seam of two adjacent panels, applying new joint compound, sanding, and repainting.

DamageStates.Description: Local and global buckling out-of-plane and crushing of gypsum wallboards.  Studs are typically not damaged by failure of the gypsum wallboard.
DamageStates.RepairMeasures: Replace 25 feet of the affected panel along with the application of new tape, joint compound, followed by sanding and repainting.  Studs are not damaged.

DamageStates.Description: Local and global buckling out-of-plane and crushing of gypsum wallboards.  Studs are typically not damaged by failure of the gypsum wallboard.
DamageStates.RepairMeasures: Replace 100 feet of the affected panel along with the application of new tape, joint compound, followed by sanding and repainting.  Studs are not damaged.
